markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs=""
>
[Leaper's Elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=95)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 549 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This tingly solution increases the elasticity and contraction of your leg muscles. For 1 minute after drinking this elixir, you can [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36) or [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=37) as a single action instead of 2 actions. If you do, you don’t perform the initial [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=88) (nor do you fail if you don’t Stride 10 feet).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Leaper's Elixir (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 549 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 7"
pfs="Standard"
>
Leaper's Elixir (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 549 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 55 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The maximum vertical distance you can jump with a High Jump is the same as you can jump horizontally with a Long Jump.
name: Leaper's Elixir (Lesser)
